Articles.Content:
Like the idea would make you think. The ability to control kerbals like lemmings. I would imagine the ability to simply make one the leader and then set other kerbals to lemming control. They would go in a line and get behind the last lemming in the lemming chain. The leader could be easily selected and walk and have all kerbals walking follow in a chain like a snake. I imagine this would not be hard to do fundamentally. And tourists or other kerbals could be like this out of the box/crew cabin and automatically get in line. Also some basic controls to auto lemming etc or maybe other formation or useful things to allow controlling of large or small kerbals easier.

Could also be fun for experimentation. Particularly if it's glitchy in some cases. 8)

It might also allow for the in game creation of some old atari/intelevision matches in game like the snake game.... Although I don't know know if you could do it fully. It might be hard to make them break away properly and shorten the snake... Might need some custom coding for that.

I was looking up the name of the old atari game and saw this video of a potentialy alternative version that might work. I think it leaves the lines in tact.

This is the one I was thinking of. SNAFU!!

 

The memories!! ><

I guess it would work depending on the game mode.
